definition: to touch/to make contact with sth/to stir up sb's emotions
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Cloaked before me, right within my immediate reach was a beautiful life worth living.
sentences.chinese: 被遮蓋住的是我觸手可及的值得去生活的美麗人生。

sentences.english: Josh looks up and sees that the contracting tentacles are bringing him much closer to the pulpy mouth.
sentences.chinese: 傑克往上看見纏着他的觸手正在把他送近柔軟的嘴巴。

sentences.english: Each tentacle is about two millimeters long.
sentences.chinese: 圖中每一個觸手大約兩毫米長。

sentences.english: The player will then have to flee through a series of obstacles in order to escape the beast.
sentences.chinese: 玩家需要逃過一系列觸手攻擊來逃脫達哈卡。

sentences.english: To the right you will see gears with a tentacle wrapped around them.
sentences.chinese: 在右側，您將會看到一個觸手纏繞其齒輪。

sentences.english: It is extending its trade tentacles into Africa and Latin America.
sentences.chinese: 它正在把貿易觸手延及非洲，乃至拉美。

sentences.english: Master peer, You the most distance in my fingertips.
sentences.chinese: 朱梓驍，你在我那觸手可及的最遠處。

sentences.english: Few natural wonders are as accessible and as beautiful as Lake Tahoe.
sentences.chinese: 很少自然奇觀像太浩湖這樣極富於美麗又觸手可得。

sentences.english: I don't like memories, large tracts of the feelings of sadness, tentacle.
sentences.chinese: 從來都不喜歡回憶，大片大片的憂傷情緒，觸手冰涼。

sentences.english: Glazing of high-profile, tentacle didn't touch the temperature.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃窗裏的高調，觸手碰不到的溫度。

sentences.english: Commercial space travel is now almost within reach of ordinary citizens.
sentences.chinese: 商業空間飛行現已幾乎觸手可及。

sentences.english: Now the Libya that you deserve is within your reach.
sentences.chinese: 現在，你們所希望擁有的利比亞已經觸手可及。

sentences.english: Bolts of lightning descend like tentacles from a storm-roiled sky. It was Benjamin Franklin who discovered in 1752 that lightning is actually electricity.
sentences.chinese: 閃電像千萬只觸手從暴雨肆虐的天空中打到地面上。

sentences.english: Victory appeared to be virtually guaranteed, but this time, Usain Bolt messed up on the big stage.
sentences.chinese: 勝利似乎已經觸手可及，但是這次他犯了重大的錯誤。

sentences.english: Restaurant worker Baek Mun-soo said he likes the fresh taste of live octopus tentacles. "Live means fresh, " he said.
sentences.chinese: 飯店工人門敏洙說他喜歡喫新鮮的活章魚的觸手。

sentences.english: Zazz grasps a target with its multiple subterraneantentacles.
sentences.chinese: 賽斯用他多隻地下觸手來抓住目標。

definition: to get an electric shock/to be electrocuted/electric shock
